card_text: Target 1 "Despia" monster or 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster in your GY; Special Summon it, then you can apply this effect.$N‚óèFusion Summon 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from either field.$NYou can only activate 1 "Branded Banishment" per turn.
